```{r 5.1}
library(rethinking)
data(WaffleDivorce)
d <- WaffleDivorce
```
```{r 5.1b}
d$D <- standardize(d$Divorce)
d$M <- standardize(d$Marriage)
d$A <- standardize(d$MedianAgeMarriage)
```

```{r 5.3}
m5.1 <- quap(
  alist(
    D ~ dnorm(mu, sigma),
    mu <- a + bA * A,
    a ~ dnorm(0, 0.2),
    bA ~ dnorm(0, 0.5),
    sigma ~ dexp(1)
  ), data = d
)
```

```{r 5.4}
set.seed(10)
prior <- extract.prior(m5.1)
mu <- link(m5.1, post=prior, data = list(A = c(-2,2)))

plot(NULL,
     xlim = c(-2, 2),
     ylim = c(-2, 2))

for(i in 1:50){
  lines(c(-2, 2), mu[i,], col = col.alpha("black", 0.4) )
}
```
